name: ghmd-dev
description: This is not a package itself. It just defines an environment to develop and test the `ghmd` package. It is available for python and node, both can be found under the `src` directory.

scripts.prepare: (rimraf src/node/shared && ncp src/shared src/node/shared) & (rimraf src/python/shared && ncp src/shared src/python/shared)
